覴字的基本解释

覴
dèng
古同“瞪”。
直视；长久地看。

覴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dēng］
［《廣韻》丑證切，去證，徹。］
(1)长久注视；直视。
(2)同“瞪”。

覴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覴； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1137第12
【集韻】都騰切。音登。久視也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?丑證切，讀若秤。直視貌。或作眙。

覴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覴字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
dèng
Gu Tong "stared".
Look straight; look for a long time.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dēng］
["Guangyun" ugly proof cut, go to proof, thorough. ]
(1) Look at for a long time; look straight.
(2) Same as "stare".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　覴; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1137 Page 12
[Jiyun] All Tengqie. Indon. Jiu Shi also.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Ugly proof cut, read Ruo scale. Look straight. Or make a pimples.
